alert.note: Alert for Adams; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:41PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL ADAMS AND SOUTHWESTERN YORK COUNTIES THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 341 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hanover, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring which may lead to localized flooding. Locations impacted include... York, Hanover, Weigelstown, Parkville, Spry, Dallastown, Shiloh, East York, Stonybrook-Wilshire, West York, Shrewsbury, Codorus, Grantley, Tyler Run-Queens Gate, Manchester, Emigsville, Spring Grove, Glen Rock, Dover and Pennville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
